    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Bishop
    The Bishop class represents a bishop chess piece.
    Board
    The Board class represents an 8x8 chess board and manages piece placement, movement, and game state checks such as check and checkmate.
    Color
    The Color enum represents the two possible sides in a chess game: White and Black.
    Game
    The Game class is the central controller for the chess application.
    King
    The King class represents a king chess piece.
    Knight
    The Knight class represents a knight chess piece.
    Main
    Entry point of the Chess Application.
    Pawn
    The Pawn class represents a pawn chess piece.
    Piece
    Abstract base class for all chess pieces.
    Player
    The Player class represents a chess player.
    Position
    The Position class represents a single square on the chess board using zero-based row and column indices.
    Queen
    The Queen class represents a queen chess piece.
    Rook
    The Rook class represents a rook chess piece.
